verbose_text: Taken together, we first indicated that ABCG2 physiologically mediates renal urate excretion as well as extra-renal (intestinal) urate excretion, and its dysfunctional mutations are involved in all types of hyperuricemia as their major genetic causes (XREF_FIG).
evidence: ABCG2 physiologically mediates renal urate excretion as well as extra-renal (intestinal) urate
